title: Autoliv, CAIT inaugurate joint innovation lab for high-dynamic driving simulators
text:
Autoliv, CAIT inaugurate joint innovation lab for high-dynamic driving simulators
A joint innovation laboratory for high-dynamic driving simulators established by Autoliv and China Automotive Intelligent Technology (Tianjin) Co., Ltd. (CAIT) was inaugurated in Tianjin. The core objective of the cooperation between the two parties is to integrate Autolivâ€™s global automotive safety technology with C....
